version_description:
- fixed undo when using tap-and-hold gesture

Version 2.0:
- new beautiful flat iOS 7 style interface
- optimized for new devices: iPhone 5c/5s, iPad Air, iPad Mini with Retina
- added "tap and hold" gesture to apply twirl/grow/shrink/erase effects
- added Twitter/Facebook sharing
- few minor bugs fixed
- fixed not working sliders on iOS 11

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- fixed problem with interface on iPad, when app is launched in Horizontal orientation on iOS 11
